title: Stalker vs. Alien
original_name: ストーカー vs.エイリアン
sinopse:
Taiyou Hinata has unrequited love for Hazuki Kinoshita, who is stalked by guys from not just around the city, but the whole universe. In order to protect her from his fellow stalkers (yeah, he's one of them), he will use his stalking skills.

(Source: MU, edited)
